entry.title: Research Directions
entry.content:
The Oleynik group designs new materials and predicts their structural, electronic, and mechanical properties using first-principles density functional theory and classical molecular dynamics.

Current fields of research include novel energetic materials, two-dimensional materials, materials at extreme conditions, and the development of environment-dependent bond-order potentials.
entry.summary: The Oleynik group designs new materials and predicts their structural, electronic, and mechanical properties using first-principles density functional theory and classical molecular dynamics.
